title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: When opening the Open Type dialog, obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are prominently displayed.
EB: The Open Type dialog should not display obfuscated classes prominently.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the software.
2. Open the Open Type dialog.
3. Observe the presence of obfuscated classes in the dialog.

Possible steps to resolve the bug:
a) Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
b) Filter out obfuscated classes completely.
